fields.headline: Blair on...
fields.bodyText: ...125 days in Iraq 'Under the original timetable for the conflict it was going to take 125 days to complete it. Well, we are still within 125 days now, so I think it is possible to exaggerate the problems and difficulties' ...Alastair Campbell 'He is a big, strong player and he is absolutely superb in a job that is immensely difficult... You don't cool when you are working as closely as that with people' ...the NHS reforms 'We mustn't flinch from the reforms, we must carry on... because the whole purpose of the health service reforms is to put power in the hands of the ordinary patient, irrespective of their wealth'
